entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as having a 'pallid, toadlike face' and 'prominent, pouchy eyes', indicating that she is a person with distinct physical characteristics. She is also mentioned as being at Harry's hearing and working for Fudge.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as scanning the staff table and muttering to herself, indicating that she is a person who is paying attention to her surroundings. She also asks questions about Umbridge's presence.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as making a comment about Hermione's cardigan, indicating that he is a person present in the scene.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as being someone Umbridge works for, indicating that he is a person with some authority or influence.

entities.name: grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is described as appearing behind the staff table and taking a seat, indicating that she is a professor who has some role in the scene.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as being absent from his usual seat, indicating that he is a professor with some significance in the scene.

entities.name: first years
entities.description: The first years are described as looking scared and arriving at the castle, indicating that they are students who are new to the school.

relationships.description: Hermione is concerned about Umbridge's presence and asks questions about it, indicating that she has some relationship with Umbridge.
Ron teases Hermione about her cardigan, indicating that he has a playful relationship with her.
